docs.snippet: Grieving together? Forget it. Unlike past violence in France, the Bastille Day attack on Nice didn't inspire political solidarity — instead it sharpened the anger of government critics, fortified the hard right and made it even less plausibl...
docs.lead_paragraph: Grieving together? Forget it. Unlike past violence in France, the Bastille Day attack on Nice didn't inspire political solidarity — instead it sharpened the anger of government critics, fortified the hard right and made it even less plausible that Socialist President Francois Hollande will win re-election next year.

headline.main: French Right Rises, Hollande Flails After Nice Attack
headline.print_headline: French Right Rises, Hollande Flails After Nice Attack
